Class Search

java.lang.Object
  hoipolloi.Search

public class Search
extends java.lang.Object

A Class to Perform Text Searches on the Hoi Polloi Database.

Constructor Detail

Search

public Search()
Creates a new search object. All of the columns to search in are enabled by default. This includes first name, last name, nick name, description, and various columns in the address and contact tables.

howManyAreOn

private int howManyAreOn()
A private helper method to see how many of the columns to search in are enabled.

Returns:
The number of columns to search in that are enabled.

performSearch

public java.util.ArrayList performSearch(java.lang.String searchQuery)
Performs a text search on the Hoi Polloi database.

Parameters:
searchQuery - The text to search for.
Returns:
The List of people matching the search text.
